articles.title: European summit in Moldova tackles Ukraine war, regional conflicts - The Associated Press
articles.description: BULBOACA, Moldova (AP) — Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy took his quest for more arms and support to a sprawling summit of some 50 European leaders in Moldova on Thursday, becoming the focal point of an event that seeks to quell regional conflicts and…
